member.name: T:Tools_For_Translation.Tool
member.summary:
The main Basic Tool class. Contains methods for input detection and unit conversion functions.
Check_InputEnsure the input is valid
ToInchConvert centimeters to inches
ToCmConvert inches to centimeters

member.name: M:Tools_For_Translation.Tool.check_input(System.String)
member.summary: Determine if the input is valid and returns true or false. Input is valid when it contains only numbers, ','(separators), less than ONE '.'(decimal points).
